explanation: Funds are required to complete integration of Data Links technologies into the Common Hypersonic Glide Body (CHGB). Data Links technologies will provide the Warfighter capability to hold multiple targets at risk and will be fielded to Army Long Range Hypersonic Weapon (LRHW) Battery #2 in FY 2025. Funds will integrate the Data Links transceiver and antenna in the CHGB, as well as update the navigation system and flight software to enable Data Links missions. This is a base budget requirement.
Funds are available due to the requirement having been satisfied at a lower cost. Funds are lexcess to need. This is base budget funding.
